entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Professor Slughorn is mentioned as the one being asked for help by Harry. He looks terrified and raises his hand to press his fingers to his mouth.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one asking Professor Slughorn for help, and also as the one who helped someone (implied to be a wizard) kill Lily Evans.

entities.name: lily evans
entities.description: Lily Evans is mentioned as the person killed by a wizard, and Harry's mother.

relationships.description: Harry asks Professor Slughorn for help in destroying a wizard who killed Lily Evans.
Professor Slughorn is scared that Harry helped someone kill Lily Evans and will find out he helped him.
